channel.title: South Dakota on Contact United States Senators and Governors
channel.description: Recent content in South Dakota on Contact United States Senators and Governors

item.title: Jamie Smith for governor 2022
item.description: Jamie Smith for governor Jamie serves as Minority Leader in the South Dakota House of Representatives, where he has delivered bipartisan solutions for the people of South Dakota. Jamie believes we are strongest when we work together to get things done. Jamie is a lifelong South Dakotan. A realtor and former educator, Jamie isn’t a career politician, and he understands the needs of all South Dakotans. Every day, Jamie rolls up his sleeves to bring people together on the big issues South Dakotans face: affordable housing, high-quality education and healthcare, and an economy that works for everyone.

item.title: Kristi Noem for governor 2022
item.description: Kristi Noem for South Dakota governor Kristi Noem is a wife, mother, grandmother, rancher, farmer, small business owner, and New York Times bestselling author of “Not My First Rodeo: Lessons from the Heartland.” Governor Kristi Noem’s political career began with her 2006 election to the South Dakota State Legislature followed by her move to the United States House of Representatives and finally a return to Pierre as the state’s first female Governor.
